title: Can not find server Counter-Strike 1.6
description:
Can not find server Counter-Strike 1.6?
Steam for players search for servers on the Internet will not make any difficulties, but for players No Steam can cause errors: 'Could not contact master game server to retrieve server list.' (Unable to connect to master server and get a list of servers.) Or 'Unable to determine Master Server addresses. Server Browser will not function correctly. '(Unable to determine the address of the Master Server. Search Server will not work properly.). Therefore, we propose to download and install our patch. With it you will not have more of these problems. It is suitable for any assembly Counter Strike 1.6.

Instructions for installation:

1) Download the patch from any two sources.

2) Install in the directory with the game.

3) Enjoy the large list of servers Counter Strike 1.6.

Our patch automatically overwrite files:

MasterServers.vdf

MasterServer2.vdf

rev_MasterServers.vdf

And put the protection of correspondence on the server side (slow hacking servers).
